V.iii.1.C.5.a
.
Example of Degenerative Arthritis With Separately Compensable Joints Affected
Situation
:  The Veteran has residuals of degenerative arthritis with limitation of abduction of the right shoulder (major) to 90 degrees and limitation of flexion of the right knee to 45 degrees.
Coded Conclusion
:
1. SC (VE INC)
5003-5201
Degenerative arthritis, right shoulder (dominant)
20% from 12-14-03
5003-5260
Degenerative arthritis, right knee
10% from 12-14-03
COMB
30% from 12-14-03
Rationale
:  The shoulder and knee separately meet compensable requirements under
38 CFR 4.71a, DCs 5201
and
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5260
, respectively.
